title: Under Armour Men's Packaged Base 2.0 Crew-neck T-shirt
description: UA Base 2.0 Active Baselayer is lightweight, flexible & breathable for high activity in cool conditions|UA Scent Control Technology to keep you undetected in all pursuits|Soft, brushed grid interior traps air, managing your body's microclimate to keep you warm & comfortable|Material wicks sweat & dries really fast|4-way stretch construction moves better in every direction

UA Base™ 2.0 Active Baselayer is lightweight, flexible & breathable for high activity performance in cool conditions. UA Scent Control Technology to keep you undetected in all pursuits. Soft, brushed grid interior traps air against your skin, closely managing your body's microclimate to keep you warm & comfortable. Material wicks sweat & dries really fast. 4-way stretch construction moves better in every direction.
